text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: To echo the words of a wise<n>philosopher—

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
"Shame sweetens the soul, for<n>beyond its grip lies the truest
of<n>emotions—a cathartic joy<n>indescribable." Which
means...

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
Simping for cute girls is a rite by<n>which my filthy heart is
purified! To<n>respect is to know shame, and<n>embracing that
truth fills my soul with<n>heaven's light! A hope so pure it, it—

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Gasp. I-it was just a dream...

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
(My name is Agnes Digital. I'm just<n>your average, ordinary
Umamusume.)

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
(I'm currently trying to mentally filter<n>the air I breathe. And
why's that, you<n>ask?)

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: (Because I couldn't possibly inhalethe same air my oshis just breathed! Ican't believe I'm at the Tracen Academy! And you won't believewhat I'm seeing right now—)

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Could you stop? Quit following me<n>around already!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Who's following who?! I was justheading to the training course.You're the one always taggingalong!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
(What?! They act like they hate each<n>other, but they totally
just stopped to<n>talk...)

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
(Either one of them could've just run<n>off and ignored the
other! But they<n>didn't! And why do you think that is?)

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: (Because those two aredefinitely more than rivals...)

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: (Aaaaahasfdhh... The fanservice is<n>unreal!)

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: (And that is what I enrolled for.To simp for my favs right on thefrontlines! To experience all thehighlights right here in real time, andmentally cheer for them in person!)

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: (I'll follow Tracen Academy forever...<n>FOREVEEEER!!1!!1!)

text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text:
Well, Trainer, I believe that's all for<n>today. I hope it gave you
a good<n>sense of the academy.

text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text:
Tracen supports a wide variety of<n>racing styles and
students. Have a<n>look around and try to find someone<n>you
want to train. ♪
choice_data_list: Of course! I'll do my best!

text_block_list.text:
Tracen Academy... A training facility<n>for Umamusume looking
to compete in<n>the Twinkle Series.

It took a lot of hard work, but I'm<n>finally a fully-fledged
trainer. What I<n>lack in experience, I'm determined to<n>make
up in passion!
I might've hyped myself up a littletoo much, though... As I watch thetrainees run, I unconsciously let out a cheer.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Aaagh, I can't believe Vodka! Why is<n>she always trying to
steal my place?!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: I swear, I'm never losing to thatjerk!

Yes... No matter how powerful your<n>rival may seem, you're
a goddess on<n>the track and no one can say<n>otherwise!
I'm so honored that I get to worship<n>the ground at your feet!
Radiant! Dazzling! Absolutely<n>divineee!

Bathed in cheers, Daiwa Scarlet<n>surges down the
homestretch with<n>blinding speed!

My fists are pumping, my heart is<n>racing! ...And then I
remember where I<n>am and sneak a glance to the side.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Hehhh, hweeegh, haha... hah...

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
You could practically sense the<n>imaginary Vodka she was
fighting. The<n>mere thought of her rival catching up<n>gave
her the strength to power down<n>the last three furlongs...

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
And that tiny satisfied smirk on her<n>face when she crossed
the goal was<n>just—haaahjkasdk! Heaven is<n>feeding us
so good today... Am I right<n>or am I right?!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: What?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
Oh, uh, s-sorry. Got a little carried<n>away there... That
Umamusume sure<n>was something, huh? Heheh...

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: But you were really making sure thegoddess of victory heard yourprayers, shouting like that. I'm gonnahave to up my simp game.

The sudden otaku monologue<n>stunlocks my brain for a solid
couple<n>of seconds, and then it hits me: why<n>is this
student here instead of down<n>on the track?
choice_data_list: Hey, can I ask you somethi—

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
Wh-what?! Oh my gosh, wait, they're<n>gonna run together?!
After all that<n>complaining?!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
Was all that tsundere stuff just a<n>struggle to show her true
feelings?!<n>Eeeep, are we even allowed to be<n>watching
this?! The sinfully<n>bittersweet taste of rivals to—

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Ah, r-right. G-go on ahead.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
Actually, I bet this is about me being<n>too loud, huh? To make
it up to you,<n>just pick a racer and I'll tell you all<n>the lore I
know.
choice_data_list:
No, I was wondering why you aren't running with
them.

No, I was wondering why you aren't running with
them.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Run with them? Me?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
Wh-what? Are you out of your mind?<n>You just saw how
beautiful that<n>technique was! I would just ruin the<n>view!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
I couldn't run like that even in my<n>dreams! Not to mention
it'd definitely<n>cross the line. Got it? Not happening!
choice_data_list: But you are a student here, right?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: That doesn't mean I belong on the<n>same track as them!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
It'd be an affront against art—and I'm<n>talking like "burning
of Alexandria"<n>bad! That kinda hubris is what<n>brought
down the Tower of Babel!<n>Anyhow...

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
Look, it'd be like enjoying a<n>luxurious five-star dessert and
then<n>eating a nasty old half-boiled<n>lukewarm brussels
sprout!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
A simp like you should understand<n>how wrong it'd be!
Okay? I'll just<n>see myself out, so see ya 'round,<n>Trainer!
Aaaand she's gone.

She was certainly... unique. That<n>speech of hers just made
me a little<n>more curious about her own abilities,<n>if anything.
